body.p: Powell County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Celia Daniel Stewart. Father of Patterson Stewart, Jensey Stewart, Louisa Stewart, Ann Stewart, Sarah F. Stewart, Mary J. Stewart, Caroline Stewart, and Henry Clay Stewart. Farmer in Montgomery County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Powell County in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in Powell County in 1860.
